MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G77 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a secondary fault on our underground cable network and are continuing repair work to restore power supply and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:37am on 17th January
